title: Reset Your Password
body: Your account was locked. Reset now: click the link below. (Sender name looks right but the email address is slightly different.)

choices.label: Reset via this email link
choices.feedback: Risky choice. Phishing emails copy logos and names. The link leads to a fake login to steal your password.

choices.label: Go to the official app/website
choices.feedback: Perfect. Open the service yourself (type the address or use your app) and reset there if needed. Enable two-factor authentication (2FA).
